name: Easy international
description: Easy international is recruiting application. The application is built on Django, ReactJS and Graphql

name: Ontarget Cloud
description: onTarget is a mobile and visual collaboration solution for the construction industry, which is plagued with cost and time overruns ($250B / year in US). A typical construction project uses 12+ discrete software applications (and paper), across 20+ teams.

name: Synapse Pay
description: SynapsePay is a payment gateway application. The web application is built on React Js and Redux architecture.
